description: Wolves news: What's one thing nobody is talking about - have your say
title: Wolves news: What's one thing nobody is talking about
title_page: Wolves news: What's one thing nobody is talking about - have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
Just one defeat in their past five Premier League games has all but secured Wolves' top-flight status for another season, with Vitor Pereira's appointment proving to have the desired effect.
However, with Matheus Cunha expressing his desire to move on and a squad that is arguably underperforming relative to its quality, there is uncertainty over the direction of the club.
You know your club best - tell us the one thing that is going under the radar but people really should be talking about at Wolves?
